newsitem.title: USA: Spinnaker issues $115 mln in 144A notes.
newsitem.headline: Spinnaker issues $115 mln in 144A notes.

text.p: The following rule 144A private placement debt issue from Spinnaker Industries Inc was priced late on Friday, a high-yield market source said.
The deal was increased in size by $15 million and was said to be several times oversubscribed.
BT Securities Corp was sole manager on the deal.
TYPE SNR SEC NOTES ISS PRICE 100.00 FIRST PAY DATE 4/15/97
LAST MOODY B3 YIELD 10.75 PCT PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL
LAST S&P SINGLE-B CALLABLE NON-CALL FIVE
NOTES THREE YEAR EQUITY CALL FOR 1/3 AT 110.75
